SEARCH
Package gov.cdc.izgateway.xform

Class LogController

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgateway.LogControllerBase
gov.cdc.izgateway.xform.LogController
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RolesAllowed({"admin","operations","blacklist"}) @RequestMapping("/rest") @Lazy(false) public class LogController extends gov.cdc.izgateway.LogControllerBase
The LogController provides access to in memory logging data on a server. This is used for integration testing to verify log content is as expected when sending messages.
